section: Exercise 4.18.1: Counting strings over {a, b, c}.
instructions: Count the number of strings of length 9 over the alphabet {a, b, c} subject to each of the following restrictions.
question:
(f)

The characters in the string "abababa" appear consecutively somewhere in the 9-character string. (So "ccabababa" would be such a 9-character string, but "cababcaba" would not.)
